title: Diphthong font - my first typophile contact
content:
[Diphthong sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224321/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1523.html).   
   
Ok, I knew I once visited Typophile ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224321im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif). I loved the Diphthong ID/font and looked for the name on google. Very nice font, does anyone knows if this was ever released?
author: adriano

comments.content: There's a link to author's website ( [http://www.diphthong.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224321/http:/www.diphthong.com/) ) and there it's said that they use it for corporate identity. No "goodies" or "download" page either ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018224321im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
